title: Abdullah Al Shemali
text:
Abdullah Al Shemali (born 18 June 1988 in <a href="Kuwait%20City">Kuwait City</a>) is a <a href="Kuwait">Kuwait</a>i <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>, who plays for the <a href="Kuwaiti%20Premier%20League">Kuwaiti Premier League</a> club <a href="Al-Arabi%20SC%20%28Kuwait%29">Al Arabi</a>.
He played for Al-Arabi in the <a href="2007%20AFC%20Champions%20League">2007 AFC Champions League</a> group stage.
